summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Terabox file storage system. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all core features: page loading, folder creation, folder deletion, navigation (double-click and breadcrumbs), search functionality, and empty folder state display.
critical_code_review_comments: Terabox.js icon fix verified - FileText used instead of non-existent FilePdf
All Terabox API endpoints working correctly: stats, pastas (CRUD), ficheiros (upload/download/delete), pesquisar, categorias
Frontend properly displays toast notifications for success/error states
Stats badges update correctly after folder/file operations
Breadcrumb navigation works correctly for folder hierarchy
seed_data_creation: Test folders and files created during testing were cleaned up via TestTeraboxCleanup class
context_for_next_testing_agent: Terabox file storage system fully tested. Test file /app/tests/test_terabox.py covers: authentication, stats, folder CRUD, file upload/download/delete, search, and categories. All tests pass. Existing folders in Terabox: 'Contratos 2026', 'Documentos Motoris...'

terabox_page_load.description: Page loads correctly after parceiro login, shows header, stats badges, action buttons

create_folder.description: Nova Pasta button opens dialog, folder creation works, toast shows 'Pasta criada com sucesso', stats update

upload_files.description: File upload tested via API - uploads work, files stored correctly, download returns correct content

download_files.description: Download endpoint returns correct file content with proper filename

folder_navigation.description: Double-click on folder navigates inside, breadcrumbs update, 'Abrir' menu option works

breadcrumb_navigation.description: Clicking 'Início' returns to root, clicking folder name in breadcrumb navigates to that folder

search_files.description: Search input works, search button triggers search, 'Limpar pesquisa' clears results, empty results show 'Nenhum resultado encontrado'

delete_folder.description: Folder context menu shows 'Eliminar', confirmation dialog works, folder deleted, toast shows 'Pasta eliminada', stats update

delete_files.description: File deletion tested via API - files deleted correctly, 404 returned after deletion

stats_display.description: Stats badges show total pastas, total ficheiros, and espaco_usado_formatado correctly

empty_folder_state.description: Empty folders show 'Esta pasta está vazia' message with helpful text

test_classes: TestTeraboxAuth (2 tests) - parceiro and admin login
TestTeraboxStats (3 tests) - get stats for parceiro, admin, and no auth
TestTeraboxPastas (4 tests) - list, create, delete, nested folders
TestTeraboxFicheiros (4 tests) - list, upload, download, delete files
TestTeraboxSearch (3 tests) - search files, empty query, no results

terabox_page.nova_pasta_dialog: PASS - Opens, accepts input, creates folder
terabox_page.search_functionality: PASS - Search input, button, clear button work
terabox_page.folder_deletion: PASS - Context menu, confirmation, deletion work
terabox_page.empty_state: PASS - Shows appropriate message for empty folders
terabox_page.toast_notifications: PASS - Success toasts for create/delete operations
